bs-responsibleeditors-desc: Enables MediaWiki to manage responsible editors for pages
bs-responsibleeditors-pref-responsibleed: Add pages to responsible editors' watchlists
bs-responsibleeditors-pref-echange: Notify when page has been changed
bs-responsibleeditors-pref-edelete: Notify when page has been deleted
bs-responsibleeditors-pref-emove: Notify when page has been moved
bs-responsibleeditors-error-ajax-not-all: Access denied. You are not authorized to perform this action.
bs-responsibleeditors-statebartop-icon-a: There is a responsible editor for this page
bs-responsibleeditors-error-specialpage-: The given page does not exist.
bs-responsibleeditors-mail-text-new-edit: $2 {{GENDER:$1|assigned}} you to "$3". After logging into the wiki you can open the page with this link: $4. If you have any questions please refer to $2.
bs-responsibleeditors-mail-text-former-e: $2 {{GENDER:$1|revoked}} the responsibility for the page "$3". The new {{PLURAL:$5|responsible editor is|responsible editors are}}: $4. After logging into the wiki you can open the page with this link: $6. If you have any questions please refer to $2.
bs-responsibleeditors-mail-text-re-artic: The page "$1" for which you are assigned as a responsible editor has been {{GENDER:$2|edited}} by $3. After logging into the wiki you can open the page with this link: $4
The page "$1" for which you are assigned as a responsible editor has been {{GENDER:$2|deleted}} by $3. After logging into the wiki you can open the page with this link: $4
The page "$1" for which you are assigned as a responsible editor has been {{GENDER:$3|moved}} to "$2" by $4. After logging into the wiki you can open the page with this link: $5
bs-responsibleeditors-no-own-responsibil: There are no pages which you are the responsible editor for.
bs-responsibleeditors-yourresponsibiliti: List of pages which you are responsible for.
action-responsibleeditors-viewspecialpag: view pages which are protected with the "ResponsibleEditors-Viewspecialpage" right
bs-responsibleeditors-rbdisplaymodeonlya: Show only pages with responsibility already assigned
bs-responsibleeditors-rbdisplaymodeonlyn: Show only pages without assigned responsibility
log-description-bs-responsibleeditors: This is a log of editors responsible for pages.
